articles.description: The leaker Jon Prosser has laid some claim to some new Pixel 4a availability information. Its launch is now thought to take place in July 2020, although it may not actually be released until October. However, another tipster now alleges that it may not arrive…
articles.content: The next generation of the more mid-range Google Pixel series and when it will launch exactly has been the subject of quite a lot of speculation all through this year. This is due to its potential ro… [+1274 chars]

articles.title: Potionomics has a publisher: Xseed Games - VentureBeat
articles.description: Potionomics is a blend of shop sim and RPG, and Xseed Games has signed developer Voracious Games to a publishing deal for it. It'll appear on PC, but they di...

articles.title: Apple's transition to its own processors: What to expect - Macworld
articles.description: Apple has shifted processor architectures in the Mac twice before. History doesn’t repeat itself, but it does rhyme.
articles.content: A new report claims that Apple will make a significant announcement at WWDC a couple weeks from now: a transition in Mac hardware away from Intels x86 processors and toward its own custom-designed AR… [+9536 chars]

articles.author: Chantelle Van Deventer
articles.title: The wallpaper that crashes Android devices - The South African
articles.description: As if we didn’t have enough security issues in this age of technology, we now have a certain image that if added to your phones wallpaper could crash your entire phone.
articles.content:
This issue was first discovered after a Twitter user had leaked the image that apparently causes this crash.
This malfunction has now been verified by 9to5Google and Android Authority.
It is rumour… [+2288 chars]
